meta.description: Experts in software development, we have at heart to design custom products, which are tailored to your needs, and where quality is a non-negotiable criteria

team.heading: Who am I?
paragraph: With more than 15 years experience in software development, I became an entrepreneur after spending more than half of my career as an IT consultant for companies in various industries (banking, insurance, energy, utilities, media, sports...) and of various sizes (from small companies to multinationals).
In my last experience before my entrepreneurial leap, I was CTO of an IT consulting company for more than 3 years, in parallel to my software developer and senior consultant role.

Designing high quality software is my passion, and I like to be proud of the work I do. In addition to my mandates, I spend a lot of time constantly training myself to stay on top of the latest technologies, in order to be able to provide the best solutions to your various problems.

I am an expert in software development quality practices, also called Software Craftsmanship practices (practices such as Clean Code, Refactoring, Test Driven Development...) and I am certified on several technologies as well as on the eco-design of digital services (Green IT).
I had the opportunity to be a speaker in major technical conferences such as Devoxx in France or Web À Québec.

In 2018, I made the decision to emigrate from France to settle in Montreal, Quebec. After many peregrinations in the different Quebec regions, and having a strong attraction for the countryside and nature, I fell in love with Charlevoix region, bordered on one side by the magnificent Saint-Laurent river and on the other by the majestic Laurentides mountain range.

I decided to make the move in 2022 by leaving Montreal to settle in Charlevoix-Est, in the city of Clermont. It is then that I decided to launch myself in the entrepreneurial adventure, to use my skills and my expertise for the local companies.
My other passions? Hiking in the Quebec countryside, and wildlife and landscape photography.

meta.title: Coaching and training | Services | CLWeb Charlevoix
meta.description: We can coach and train one or more of your company's software development teams in quality practices

sections.title: What is a coaching and training mandate?
paragraphs: A coaching and training mandate consists of transmitting knowledge to one or more people, on one or more topics, in order for the targeted person(s) to increase their level of expertise.

Training and coaching have the same objective, but in two different ways:
- Training is targeted on a topic or theme and is delivered over 1 to 2 days. During these days, the participants are not working on their daily tasks, and are focused on the training. This allows us to transmit the maximum amount of information in a minimum amount of time, and to take the time to answer questions. The mandate ends once the training is completed.
- Coaching is an accompaniment over time, to help implement or use one or more topics (for example a technology or a practice) on daily tasks. The knowledge transfer is, therefore, closer to the field and to real problems compared to training, but is less formal. The mandate can be performed at a decreasing pace: start with a few days per week and then progressively reduce the presence to end with a few hours per week.

It is common to combine the two approaches: start with training to transmit the maximum of knowledge and thus have a solid base, then in a second time coaching to apply the knowledge acquired during training in the real conditions of everyday life.
sections.emphasis: We are specialized in training and coaching on software development quality practices that help produce maintainable and scalable code over the long term.

sections.title: Who is it for?
paragraphs: Training and coaching can be done for a single person in charge of software development and maintenance in your company or for an entire development team.

Therefore, if you are a company manager or a team leader and you would like to help your employees improve their practices in order to produce maintainable and scalable code, we can assist you in this process.
If you are yourself a developer and you want to improve your technical knowledge or your software quality practices, we can help you through personalized coaching.

sections.title: Why work with us?
paragraphs: We have more than 15 years of experience in software development, and we are experts in quality development practices, also called Software Craftsmanship practices (practices such as Clean Code, Refactoring, Test Driven Development...). We are also certified in several technologies as well as in the eco-design of digital services (Green IT).

Over the past 15 years, we have conducted many training sessions for groups of different levels and for companies in various business fields. We adopt a pedagogical approach that allows us to transmit our knowledge simply and efficiently, by adapting our speech to the audience's level.

By working with us, you benefit from personalized training and coaching, adapted to your context and your requirements, unlike other more generalist training programs that offer standard but non-personalized content. In addition, we can travel to your office to deliver the training, providing a warm and enjoyable experience compared to 100% virtual training.

In addition to training and coaching, we can also come in for a morning session or for a Lunch & Learn to give awareness presentations on specific topics such as the latest technology or software development practices. These awareness sessions are ideal to "give the taste" to your teams to go further on a topic
Feel free to contact us to explain your context and your requirements, and we will be able to make a proposal adapted to your situation and your budget.

sections.title: How does a training session work?
paragraphs: First of all, it is necessary to meet with you so that you can tell us about your training needs and the challenges you are currently facing. Following this, we will be able to make an estimate and a commercial proposal.

Once the commercial proposal is accepted, we will agree on a training date. The training can be conducted virtually or on-site depending on your context. Training usually lasts from 1 to 2 days, and the participants leave with the different materials and exercises that have been presented.

For training purposes, participants must have at least 1 computer for each 2, with a reliable Internet connection. If the training is performed on-site, a dedicated room in which the computers can be set up must be booked and used during the days of attendance.

sections.title: How does a coaching mandate work?
paragraphs: To do coaching, whether it follows a training course or is requested completely independently, it is necessary to meet to share the expectations, the budget and the timeframe. This will allow us to make a commercial proposal that corresponds to your needs and your reality.

Once the terms have been established and the proposal accepted, the coaching is generally performed in a degressive way: our presence is strong at the beginning of the mandate with several days per week, then progressively reduced over the weeks or months to end with a few hours per week.

This degressive mode allows us to set up a solid foundation from the beginning and to get a good grasp of the whole context, and thus be able to provide the maximum of advice quickly. By gradually decreasing our presence, it allows the coachees to progressively gain autonomy, and we work on the most important and blocking topics when we are present.
sections.emphasis: Our goal is that the coached person(s) should be completely autonomous and that there should be no need for any further support once the mandate is completed.

sections.title: How long is this type of mandate?
paragraphs: A training session usually lasts 1 to 2 days.
Coaching can last several months and is usually done in a degressive way.

sections.title: How much does it cost?
paragraphs: The price of training is fixed and mainly depends on the number of participants and possible travel.

For coaching, the invoicing is done at an hourly rate (time and material). We therefore only invoice for the hours actually worked. Therefore, if you already have a target budget, we can give you an estimate of the number of hours and the time frame.

meta.title: Consulting and guidance | Services | CLWeb Charlevoix
meta.description: We can advise you in making important and strategic decisions for your company

sections.title: What is a consulting and guidance mandate?
paragraphs: The goal of a consulting and guidance mandate is to provide answers to a specific problem or difficulty. In our case, it can be on technological aspects as well as human aspects.

There are two main parts, which can be separated:
- the consulting part, which consists of a thorough analysis of the context and the issue, as well as the formulation of recommendations;
- the guidance part, which consists of providing support for the implementation of the recommendations formulated in the previous step.

To illustrate these two approaches, let's take an example from everyday life: imagine that you encounter difficulty in how you cook and organize yourself in the kitchen at home. To answer this:
- The consulting part: ask a chef to analyze our situation to suggest more suitable cooking recipes that would meet the same needs.
- The guidance part: be assisted by the chef in the realization of these recipes, to learn and to be sure that it will be a success.
sections.emphasis: It is possible to conduct a consulting mandate without subsequent guidance.

sections.title: Who is it for?
paragraphs: For any company, executive or manager who has to make an important and strategic decision and who would like an external viewpoint to provide a detailed analysis and relevant recommendations.

sections.title: Why use the services of a consulting company? What are the benefits?
paragraphs: Generally speaking, whatever the topic, calling on an external party always helps us to see the situation from another angle. This outside perspective is essential to be able to analyze the situation correctly. Indeed, when we analyze our own problems, we are naturally biased and this prevents us from seeing alternative solutions.
By choosing a consulting company such as ours, you are assured of two main elements:
items: The past experiences: to advise well, it is important to have experienced many different issues, in different technological contexts and different business sectors. With more than 15 years of experience, we are confident in our ability to analyze your situation and make appropriate recommendations.

The methodology: conducting a consulting mandate is not a simple discussion over a cup of coffee. It involves interviews, workshops, feedback from our observations, and the writing of a report that will be given to you at the end of the mandate. This methodology is one of the success factors of the mandates we perform, and we are proud of the quality of the deliverables we provide.
sections.emphasis: By working with us, we will conduct a detailed analysis of your needs and your context in order to advise you on your important and strategic decisions.

sections.title: How does a consulting mandate work?
paragraphs: To begin with, it is essential to meet with you the first time so that you can explain the problem you are facing. The objective for us is to understand the level of urgency and your expectations.
After this first step, a commercial proposal will follow, detailing the scope of the intervention, the operating mode, and the rates.

Once the commercial proposal is accepted, the mandate can begin. In general, the consulting mandate begins with interviews of the various people involved, in order to properly assess the situation. Depending on the context, we can also conduct workshops that will help us understand the different tools and processes involved.

Following these observations, we will write a document which will be handed to you and which will gather all the observations and the various recommendations, prioritized depending on the effort required and the expected impact.
Finally, these observations and recommendations will be presented to you orally, to make sure everyone is aligned and to answer any questions.
Following the presentation, the written document can be updated one last time based on the questions/answers that were shared during the presentation.

sections.title: What is the guidance phase?
paragraphs: The guidance phase consists of assisting you in the implementation of the various recommendations that were made during the consulting phase.
It is possible that you do not need any assistance in implementing the recommendations, which is why this phase is optional.
In case we guide you, it is possible to adapt our presence according to the expected level of assistance: it can be from a few hours per month to several days per week.

sections.title: How long is this type of mandate?
paragraphs: On average, the duration of a consulting mandate will vary between 1 and 3 months depending on the context and the scope of the issue.

Regarding the guidance phase, the duration can vary from a few weeks to several months, depending on the complexity and the number of recommendations to implement. Also, our presence with you may vary according to the level of assistance defined and can be done in a degressive way (start with several days per week and gradually decrease to a few hours per month).

sections.title: How much does it cost?
paragraphs: Since each mandate is unique, the rates may vary from one mandate to another. Nevertheless, the main parameters that will have an impact on the rates of a consulting mandate are the number of people involved, the context, and the scope of the issue. Indeed, the more people involved or the broader the issue, the longer the observation and analysis phase will be, and the more complex the recommendation formulation phase will be.
The cost of a guidance mandate varies according to the level of assistance chosen.

sections.title: Do you have examples of consulting mandates?
paragraphs: Of course. Here are some examples of questions you might have, and on which we have already conducted consulting mandates:
items: You want to significantly upgrade your website and you don't know if it is better to modify the existing website with its constraints or if it would be simpler to develop a brand new website adapted to your new requirements,
You store a lot of digital data and you would like to structure it to get the most out of it, but you don't know how to proceed,
You have tools and data stored in your company and you are hesitating to make the switch to cloud services to reduce your infrastructure costs,
You want to make your software or website responsive on cell phones and tablets and you would like to know the feasibility,
You want to shift to a digital platform and gain online customers in addition to your physical ones and you don't know where to start,
You want to know how to aggregate or consolidate your online presence, in order to have a better ranking on search engines and to be able to provide a single and simple entry point to your customers,
You store data and would like to ensure that your customers' personal information are secured according to the state of the art,
You want to analyze the quality level of an existing software or website.

meta.title: Technical Direction | Services | CLWeb Charlevoix

sections.title: What is a CTO as a service mandate?
paragraphs: A Chief Technical Officer (CTO) as a Service mandate aims to help a company or a business executive by assisting in making decisions related to Information Technology (IT). These decisions can be related to software choices, hiring, external service provider selection or budget management.

sections.title: Who is it for?
paragraphs: To any company or executive who needs help in making IT decisions but does not have the financial resources or enough work to hire a full-time person in the Technical Direction position.
With a part-time CTO as a service mandate, a person can be involved on an ad hoc basis for a few hours per week or per month.
This allows a company or an executive to delegate decision-making and management of IT resources to someone with sufficient experience and expertise to assume the role with confidence.
sections.emphasis: By not filling this role full-time, part-time intervention allows us to deal with the highest priority topics that require specific expertise, and thus optimize the return on investment.

sections.title: Why work with us?
paragraphs: We have more than 15 years of professional experience in software development and even more in IT in general. We have also worked as CTO for several years, managing budgets, IT resources, choice of providers, internal IT hiring and career growth of IT employees.

We have the experience and expertise necessary to execute this type of strategic mandate. You can therefore rely on us to help you make structuring decisions and to support you in your digital transformation.
Our intervention can be occasional or on a regular basis, depending on your needs and your budget. The objective is to maximize the return on investment of each of our interventions.

sections.title: How does a CTO as a service mandate work?
paragraphs: First of all, it is necessary to meet so that you expose us your requirements and your expectations. Following this meeting, we will be able to make you a commercial proposal presenting an on-demand intervention process, or on a regular basis.
Once the proposal is accepted, we could start to work and join if necessary your different internal processes.
In the case of occasional interventions, you contact us on demand and we intervene in the days that follow to address the specific problem you are facing.

In the case of regular interventions, we start by identifying your current issues to be addressed and defining your IT roadmap for the coming months. Thanks to this, we will be able to quickly suggest short and long-term recommendations.

We can then take care of the implementation of these recommendations, or you can do it on your own. In both cases, we define a meeting rhythm in order to make a regular follow-up and to manage the IT decisions.
Whether it is a one-time or regular intervention, it can be done remotely with virtual collaborative tools, or on-site at your company's offices.

sections.title: How long is this type of mandate?
paragraphs: The duration of a CTO as a service mandate varies depending on requirements and the IT roadmap.
For a small company that simply needs some advice, it can be a few hours spread over a month.
For a company that wishes to grow and that faces more important problems, the intervention can extend over several months, at a pace of a few hours per week.

sections.title: How much does it cost?
paragraphs: The cost of a CTO as a service mandate depends on its duration and potential travel.
The invoicing is done at an hourly rate (time and material). You only pay for hours actually worked, and the cost may vary according to the potential travel required.

sections.title: Do you have examples of technical direction tasks?
paragraphs: Of course. If you are not sure how we can help you, here are some examples of tasks we have done in the past and for which we could assist you by providing technical direction:
items: the management of your annual IT budget,
constraints and risk management,
strategic decision-making for your company,
the implementation of new IT processes,
building an internal IT training path,
the design of an IT security policy for your information system,
storage and management of your corporate data,
the selection of a cloud infrastructure,
the selection of tools or software used by your employees,
the hiring of a CTO, developers or any other IT-related person,
conducting RFPs to bid on platforms such as SEAO,
choosing external service providers who would respond to your RFPs,
technical debt management.

meta.title: Delivery and hosting | Services | CLWeb Charlevoix
meta.description: We can develop high-quality software or create a custom website, tailored to your needs and your project context

sections.title: What is a delivery and hosting mandate?
paragraphs: A delivery and hosting mandate consists in designing and deploying a custom website, an application, or any other software.

There are two main phases, which can be dissociated:
- the delivery phase, which consists in iteratively developing the custom software, according to the requirements and the budget;
- the hosting phase, which consists of deploying the software on a cloud infrastructure.
It is entirely possible to do the delivery phase without the hosting phase if another service provider is already managing the hosting, or if it is managed internally.

sections.title: Who is it for?
paragraphs: To any company or executive who wants to create a software, a website, or an application in order to save time, increase efficiency, or improve visibility to develop their business with their customers.
In these uncertain economic times and in the current labour shortage, it is important to refocus on core activities and reduce or eliminate time spent on repetitive tasks.
One example is a business process that is manual or semi-automated, paper-based or partially computerized, that takes several hours per week or month, or that has a risk of error or omission.
By reducing the time spent on low value-added tasks, it is then possible to maximize the time spent on the company's core business, whether it is production or selling products or services.
Therefore, by investing in a tailor-made software, it becomes an asset for the company and will improve the return on investment of work time, reduce the risk of manual errors, and avoid overtime.
sections.emphasis: All this has an impact not only on your professional life but also on your personal life: thanks to these benefits, you can free up more time for yourself, your hobbies or your family life. A better professional life leads to a better personal life.

sections.title: Why use the services of a software development company? What are the benefits?
paragraphs: There are many online platforms such as Wordpress, Wix and others, which allow in relatively little time and technical knowledge to create and deploy a website.

However, as soon as you want to customize the site, put it in your own image, or move away from pre-designed models, it quickly becomes complex and you are never completely satisfied. This gives a final impression of patchwork. Moreover, with this type of tool, it is impossible to create business management software that corresponds 100% to your reality and your requirements. In the end, we find ourselves having to adapt to the software when it should adapt to us.

By working with a software development company such as ours, you have total control over the visuals and features you wish to have. Indeed, the analysis of your needs is at the heart of our design process. We develop software in steps, analyzing in detail what you want, and regularly integrating your feedback so that you are completely satisfied with the final result.

- You want a website to display your products to your customers and to make online orders?
- An application to simplify the management of your business and your accounting?
- A software that will reduce the time spent on repetitive tasks and reduce the risk of manual errors?
All this is possible by creating a tailor-made software, which fits your context, and your issues, and therefore will allow you to gain maximum efficiency daily.

By calling us, we will conduct a thorough analysis of your project and we will propose the development of a website, application or any other software, tailored to your budget. Furthermore, software quality is our priority. We use state-of-the-art tools and code practices to produce robust, reliable and scalable code over the long term. The goal is that the software or website can accompany you over several years, evolving and adapting along with your company, without having to wipe the slate clean after a few years.
Finally, we can take care of deploying the software or hosting the website on cloud infrastructures, here in Canada, to be geographically close to your customers and to support the local industry.
sections.emphasis: Our mission in a nutshell: design quality software that meets your requirements, and that will scale over several years.

sections.title: How does a delivery and hosting mandate work?
paragraphs: To begin with, it is essential to meet with you once so that you can explain your project to us and we can understand your context and do an initial analysis of the situation.
Then, we will make you a commercial proposal corresponding to your budget for the realization of the product.

Once the commercial proposal is accepted, we can start the design of the custom software or website. The development is done in an iterative way (agile practices), which means that we usually work in sequences of two weeks (an iteration) intending to have a working software at the end of each iteration.

At the end of each iteration, we present to you the progress, and the difficulties faced, and you can then give us feedback that we will integrate into the next iteration. This approach also allows us to regularly adjust the scope of the mandate so that it is always adapted to your reality.
Once completed, we can then deliver the software to your company or another existing service provider, or we can take care of the deployment ourselves.
If we do the deployment, it is a new hosting and maintenance mandate.

sections.title: How long is this type of mandate?
paragraphs: The duration of a tailor-made software or website delivery mandate greatly varies depending on the context, the desired features and the budget. In the software industry, we can indeed observe durations from a few weeks to several years!
Nevertheless, we favour mandate durations of less than 3 months. This allows us to establish a reasonable budget and a list of the most important features, and we can renew the mandate if necessary.
The objective is that in less than 3 months, a functional and usable version can be deployed in production and thus bring you a return on investment quickly.
The hosting phase is a different type of contract for a one-year renewable term.

sections.title: How much does it cost?
paragraphs: For the delivery phase, billing is usually done at an hourly rate (time and material). The cost depends on the actual time spent, and therefore on the number and complexity of the desired features. Nevertheless, after the first meeting, we will be able to give you a general estimate of the cost according to your context and your requirements.

Regarding the hosting phase on a cloud infrastructure, invoicing is done monthly, based on actual usage. You only pay according to the resources actually consumed, rather than a high fixed rate every month. If you have very few users, the monthly price will be minimal.
